doc:
William Lanteau https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Lanteau 0 William Lanteau (born William Lanctot) (November 17, 1922 in St. Johnsbury, Vermont - November 3, 1993 in Los Angeles, California) was an American character actor. Among his best known roles are the mail carrier in On Golden Pond and Chester, the mayor, in Newhart. In a 1960 episode of The Andy Griffith Show entitled “Stranger In Town,” Lanteau portrayed a mysterious stranger who spooked everyone by the personal information he knew about them. William_Lanteau ( born William_Lanctot ) ( November_17_,_1922 in St._Johnsbury , Vermont - November_3_,_1993 in Los_Angeles , California ) was an_American_character_actor . Among his_best_known_roles are the_mail_carrier in On Golden_Pond_and_Chester , the_mayor , in Newhart . In a_1960_episode of The_Andy_Griffith_Show_entitled_“_Stranger_In_Town , ” Lanteau portrayed a_mysterious_stranger who spooked everyone by the_personal_information he knew about them .
